title: [WinError 5] Access Denied

labels.name: state:timedOut
labels.description: The issue owner isn't responding to questions

body:
I ran into an issue. Issues appears if either cudNN or gpu mode is used.
Using a GTX 1070 with CUDA 10.1 installed and cudNN library.

The entire log:
